name: Meta Toy DragonZ SAGA (FXERC20)
description: Train your Toy Dragon! MetaToyDragonZ is a free-to-play, play-and-earn, Polygon-based, collectible mobile role-playing game that recently took over #1 spot on Google Play chart in the US as the most popular RPG. $METOD is used to purchase in-game items, mint Gem Blocks and Meta Figure NFTs, and more. Users can trade, LP, and farm with $METOD on Quickswap.
